script:
1). Have you seen my briefcase?
No I haven't. 
I had seen it.
I didn't see it.
2). When do you want to take lunch?
I'll eat at my desk.
I want Chinese food.
Let's eat at 12:30 
3). What's the fastest way to get to the airport from here?
It's about 20 miles
Take Highway 45 
The airport is south of the city
